/usr/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -ccbin=clang-14  --generate-code=arch=compute_60,code=[compute_60,sm_60] --generate-code=arch=compute_61,code=[compute_61,sm_61] --generate-code=arch=compute_70,code=[compute_70,sm_70] --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] --generate-code=arch=compute_80,code=[compute_80,sm_80] --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[compute_86,sm_86] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/sph_simulation.dir/deviceObjects1 -o CMakeFiles/sph_simulation.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/sph_simulation.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp -L"/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
